Projects

Most recent work

Tetris in Vanilla Javascript

My favorite childhood game recreated with Canvas & DOM manipulation. Creation of the playfield and shapes. Implementation of block rotation methods. Animated interactions with arrow keys. Try it yourself!

Demo

Rick and Morty API

Use of a public API. Three pages listing data of all episodes, characters and locations of the Rick and Morty universe. Design free, project done with two other devs in HTML/SCSS and Javascript. Merge of our work.

Demo
